MARKETING CLOUD GROWTH
Manage Marketing Efforts with Campaigns

Kickstart your marketing efforts with a centralized campaign hub where you can design and automate your content. In Marketing Cloud Growth, templated campaign options simplify creating one piece of content or a multistep customer experience.

REQUIRED EDITIONS
Available in: Salesforce Enterprise and Unlimited Editions with Marketing Cloud Growth Edition
Considerations for Campaigns in Marketing Cloud Growth
When working with campaigns in Marketing Cloud Growth, keep these considerations in mind.
Campaigns in Marketing Cloud Growth
Campaigns act as a hub to organize and track all the parts of a marketing effort. A campaign can be as simple or as complex as you need, from sending a simple email to building out an automated, multistep customer experience.
Segment-Triggered Campaign Flows in Marketing Cloud Growth
Segment-triggered campaign flows send messages based on segment membership. The preconfigured campaign flow includes only email messages, but you can add SMS messages to any segment-triggered flow if you have the paid SMS add-on.
Form-Triggered Campaign Flows in Marketing Cloud Growth
A form-triggered campaign flow includes a form and a landing page, and is triggered when someone submits the form. These flows also include an action to create lead records from form submissions and an action to create consent records for marketing messages.
How Campaigns and Flows Work Together
In Marketing Cloud Growth, each campaign you create starts with a flow. The campaign record is a hub for your marketing effort, while the campaign flow automates content distribution and data collection. For more robust campaigns, add additional flows from the campaign record. Each flow inherits its name from the campaign.
Examples of Campaign Use Cases in Marketing Cloud Growth
When you create a campaign, think about your goal. Who are you trying to reach? How and when are the best ways to reach them? Answering these questions helps you choose the right flow to start with, and decide how to add to your campaign.
Campaign Members in Marketing Cloud Growth
Relate leads or contacts to a campaign to help you plan, report on engagement, and analyze the success of a campaign. The campaign member object creates a direct relationship between the campaign and the lead or contact.
Working with Campaigns and Flows in Marketing Cloud Growth
For a multitouch customer experience, use Flow Builder to extend your campaign. Use flow elements to listen for activities, trigger actions, and add steps to your customer’s journey.
